title: EP 43: Building Freedom
itunes:title: EP 43: Building Freedom
description:
In this episode of The Tactical Entrepreneur podcast, Steve talks about building freedom, did you build yourself a business or did you build yourself a job, making sure that your systems and processes are built for other people, not just for yourselves, exit strategy, core values and much more.

 

“Our businesses should serve us. We should not serve our businesses.”

   - Steve Schabacker

 

How To Get Involved:

Steve Schabacker is the co-founder of Sheepdog Firearms and an entrepreneur, bestselling author, and marketer. Between his business and his content, Steve is educating firearm owners and armed professionals and setting a new standard for shops and training centers in the industry.

You can visit Sheepdog Firearms online or reach out directly to Steve at sschabacker@outlook.com.

Check out this podcast on Apple Podcasts - don’t forget to subscribe, rate, and review!
